title: How to use the Uber app
subtitle: Our core service is developing technology that connects drivers and riders on demand. Here’s how the app works, step by step:

step.title: A rider opens the app
step.subtitle: The rider enters their destination into the “Where to?” box; reviews each ride option for vehicle size, price, and estimated dropoff time; chooses the desired option; then confirms the pickup.

step.title: The rider is matched with a driver
step.subtitle: A nearby driver sees and chooses to accept the rider’s ride request. The rider is automatically notified when the driver’s vehicle is about a minute away.

step.title: The driver picks up the rider
step.subtitle: The driver and the rider verify each other’s names and the destination. Then the driver starts the ride.

step.title: The driver takes the rider to the destination
step.subtitle: The app gives the driver the option to access turn-by-turn directions.

step.title: The driver and rider leave ratings and reviews
step.subtitle: At the end of each trip, drivers and riders can rate each other from 1 to 5 stars. Riders also have the option to give the driver compliments and a tip directly in the app.
